entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who was expelled from Hogwarts. He is also the subject of a conversation about whether he might be the one attacking people.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is part of the conversation and asks questions to try to figure out what's going on.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also part of the conversation and provides her thoughts on what might be happening.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is mentioned as someone who got an award for catching a monster, but it's suggested that he might have gotten the wrong person.

entities.name: percy riddle (implied by name only)
entities.description: Percy is implied to be similar in name to Riddle and is mentioned as someone who asked Hagrid to 'grass' on him.
